## DisjointSet.unified() method

Returns true, if the given two nodes belong to the same tree / subset.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unified(a: number, b: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | <code>number</code> | node ID |
|  b | <code>number</code> | node ID |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
